articles.title: Explained: What is 16 Psyche, the asteroid believed to be worth $10,000 quadrillion? - The Indian Express
articles.description: NASA scientists believe that the asteroid is made up of almost entirely of iron, nickel and several other rare materials like gold, platinum, cobalt, iridium and rhenium.
